text:
Should not be integrated direct, but via Cocoon repository interface or via a
higher layer than slide/webdav i.e. via JCR.
Since JCR isnt fully sepcified, slide should be intgerated at least via webdav
protocol to be independant of slide.

Stefano will checkin first steps of the cocoon rep. interface maybe in january.
See cocoon block "repository".
creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
nettings@apache.org
text:
JCR seems to be on the back burner for now. if we decide to rewrite our
repository layer, a new discussion is necessary anyway.
